dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Catherine said you can give me an ID cartridge for the C&P factory.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Not so fast. My biometric IDs are special goods. Only on offer to special clients, you cotton?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I think the fact that Catherine Malin sent me for it, makes me special enough.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The secret of your illicit dealings is safe with me. Cross my heart.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: She needs it for a job? Well, why didn't you say so? Reckoned you asked her where best to procure one and she obligingly pointed you my way.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Give me a jiffy to break- I mean, calibrate the ID.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: This goes like that, and nope, not quite right... A bit to the left mayhaps...

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: That'll do it! For a C&P factory line worker, she sure is a beauty.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Careful! I'm trusting you to guard this specialty good with your life. I mean it, lose the ID and you don't get another. Also, you'll be off my list of 'unwholesome' customers.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Will that be all or do you require something to, say, scratch your itch...?

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Well, you do look like the honestly dishonest type. By which I mean my favorite customer.

dialog.speaker: Fallbrook Vendor Duncan (Male)
dialog.utterance: Ah, uh... What do you know, you're on it! My mistake, customer.
